wordGroup: fishery resources 渔业资源；水产资源

sentences.en: Malaysia and Indonesia rely on open markets for forest and fishery products. Conversely, some Asian countries are highly protectionist.
sentences.cn: 马来西亚和印度尼西亚依靠开放的市场获取林业和渔业产品。与之相反的是，一些亚洲国家是高度的保护贸易论者。

sentences.en: Perhaps the best example of boom growth and bust decline is the Grand Banks fishery.
sentences.cn: 也许繁荣增长和萧条衰退的最好例子是大浅滩渔业。

sentences.en: Certification is for an initial period of five years, with an annual review to ensure that the fishery is continuing to meet the required standards.
sentences.cn: 证明的最初期限为五年，每年进行一次审查，以确保渔业继续达到所要求的标准。
